Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: 8:00pm: the Kids Learn to Ski class just ended. Kids were treated to several inches of fresh snow! Me? I took me forever to get to the park as cars were driving a conservative 20-25 mph on the highway. But it was fun skiing in classic tracks! Adam Haberkorn is now out on the trail packing everything down for tomorrow.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Skiing is awesome with a 24" base of natural snow and daily power tilling.  All trails are open.  Save $20 on race registration by registering online at SKIREG.com by 10 pm tonight!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked on Wednesday morning. Conditions are excellent.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: A cold and beautiful morning awaits skiers at Nub's Nob. The wind is light and the possibility of some sunshine this morning exists. The snow is in exceptional shape due to the cold, a dusting of fresh snow, and the meticulous work of the Grooming Crew. Today will be a good day to stop by the Tune Center for a fresh wax to cope with the cold and slower snow. The soup of the day is BBQ soup. Pintail Peak is open with food service and an espresso bar. Harbor Springs High School has a ski meet this afternoon on Smokey and Valley. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
